item.title: @elonmusk: Here it is:@DOGECONFIRMS: The Illegal aliens who were issued Social Security numbers by the Biden‚ÄìHa...
item.description: Here it is:@DOGECONFIRMS: The Illegal aliens who were issued Social Security numbers by the Biden‚ÄìHarris terrorist administration. ‚Ä¢ 270,425 in 2021 ‚Ä¢ 590,193 in 2022 ‚Ä¢ 964,163 in 2023 ‚Ä¢ 2,095,247 in 2024 ‚Äî on it‚Äôs way out the door. "They've been using their NGO's to dump fake voter registration forms utilizing the fake SS#'s on key county registrar's offices for the last 5-6 election cycles. Then using those fraudulent voter registrations to request ballots in the mail. Then they pay the NGO's to have their staff fill out the ballots and mail them in."@drawandstrikeüìùPass the SAVE Act.

item.title: @elonmusk: If you're a journalist interested in telling a balanced narrative and want the 'pro' orbital data ce...
item.description: If you're a journalist interested in telling a balanced narrative and want the 'pro' orbital data centers logic/math, we've made it VERY VERY easy. These articles are all open and ungated. You can just grok them if you need help parsing the numbers. Please take the time to understand the math and physics behind the pro case before publishing the skeptic case as fact. Launch limiters and initial math -research.33fg.com/analysis/i‚Ä¶Energy Cost from space -research.33fg.com/analysis/o‚Ä¶Location for ODCs why SSO -research.33fg.com/analysis/w‚Ä¶Debunking the cooling/radiator problem -research.33fg.com/analysis/d‚Ä¶The ODC landscape/China's role -research.33fg.com/analysis/o‚Ä¶explaining the Chips for ODCs -research.33fg.com/analysis/e‚Ä¶We take pride in anchoring our analysis in physics and math. We also try to communicate any assumptions when made. We welcome genuine feedback. It's worth noting that we layer on a lot of conservatism in our timelines. I wouldn't be all that surprised that Elon and others make our predictions look stupid.

item.title: @elonmusk: From Day One,@xAIhas been upgrading grid infrastructure and ensuring ratepayers don‚Äôt pick up our ta...
item.description: From Day One,@xAIhas been upgrading grid infrastructure and ensuring ratepayers don‚Äôt pick up our tab. Today, we are continuing our commitment by installing our own power lines to power our MACROHARD facilities.

item.title: @elonmusk: No more waiting for high-speed internet! We have removed waitlists for Starlink in every country whe...
item.description: No more waiting for high-speed internet! We have removed waitlists for Starlink in every country where Starlink is available today. Go tostarlink.comto find the best available service plan that works for you.

item.title: @elonmusk: A great morning for human spaceflight. Congratulations to the teams at NASA, SpaceX, and our interna...
item.description: A great morning for human spaceflight. Congratulations to the teams at NASA, SpaceX, and our international partners who worked tirelessly to launch Crew 12 safely on a journey to the International Space Station. If this is what is possible today, imagine what tomorrow will bring.

item.title: @elonmusk: xAI was reorganized a few days ago to improve speed of execution. As a company grows, especially as ...
item.description: xAI was reorganized a few days ago to improve speed of execution. As a company grows, especially as quickly as xAI, the structure must evolve just like any living organism. This unfortunately required parting ways with some people. We wish them well in future endeavors. We are hiring aggressively. Join xAI if the idea of mass drivers on the Moon appeals to you.
